Method Detail

verify_credentials

public org.json.JSONObject verify_credentials()
Verifies that the configuration used to instantiate the class (API key and secret) are valid.

Returns:
On success, an empty JSON object. On failure, null.

accounts

public org.json.JSONObject accounts()
Lists accounts belonging to the authenticated user

Returns:
JSONObject containing account information

bitcoin_address

public org.json.JSONObject bitcoin_address()
Lists bitcoin addresses belonging to the authenticated user

Returns:
JSONObject containing the bitcoin addresses

bitcoin_withdraw

public org.json.JSONObject bitcoin_withdraw(String amount,
                                            String address)
Withdraws bitcoins to a given bitcoin address

Parameters:
amount - Amount in BTC to move
address - Address to move BTC to
Returns:
JSONObject containing the status

open_orders

public org.json.JSONObject open_orders()
Lists open orders for the authenticated user

Returns:
JSONObject containing open orders

get_transaction

public org.json.JSONObject get_transaction(String id)
Retrieves information about a transaction with a specified ID

Parameters:
id - ID of transaction, generally obtained with get_transactions()
Returns:
JSONObject containing transaction

get_transactions

public org.json.JSONObject get_transactions()
Get BTC transactions associated with authenticated user with default params (limit 10, descending order, page 1)

Returns:
JSONObject containing transactions

get_transactions

public org.json.JSONObject get_transactions(String currency_cd)

Returns:
JSONObject containing transactions

JSONObject containing transactions

create_order

public org.json.JSONObject create_order(String order_type_cd,
                                        int quantity,
                                        String rate)
Create an BTCLTC order with the given properties

Parameters:
order_type_cd - 'BID' or 'ASK'
quantity - Number of units to transact
rate - Rate at which to transact (Minimum amount is 0.001 BTC)
Returns:
JSONObject containing order information

create_order

public org.json.JSONObject create_order(String order_type_cd,
                                        int quantity,
                                        String rate,
                                        String currency_pair)
Create an order with the given properties

Parameters:
order_type_cd - 'BID' or 'ASK'
quantity - Number of units to transact
rate - Rate at which to transact (Minimum amount is 0.001 BTC)
currency_pair - Currency pair to use
Returns:
JSONObject containing order information

cancel_order

public org.json.JSONObject cancel_order(String uuid)
Cancel an order

Parameters:
uuid - UUID of order, generally from open_orders()
Returns:
JSONObject containing order information

uuid - UUID of order, generally from open_orders()
Returns:
JSONObject containing order information
